description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Soldier, you’re the only thing standing between these people and a nuclear bomb.  If you don’t contain this outbreak, we’ll have no choice but to destroy the city.  Shoot these zombies in the head!
description.short: Soldier, you’re the only thing standing between these people and a nuclear bomb.  If you don’t contain this outbreak, we’ll have no choice but to destroy the city.  Shoot these zombies in the head!
